title: Manage In-Pit Crushing and Conveying
description: An operator manages an in-pit crushing and conveying (IPCC) system, where ore is crushed inside the pit and transported out via conveyor, instead of by truck.

tasks.description: Monitor the feed rate and power draw of the in-pit primary crusher.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms the IPCC system is running smoothly.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the shovel operators to ensure a steady feed of ore to the crusher to maximize utilization.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shovels and crusher are working in sync to provide a consistent flow.

tasks.description: Monitor the status of the overland conveyor that transports the crushed ore out of the pit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The conveyor is monitored for any signs of belt misalignment or other issues.
